title: Magnetic flux - flux through tilted loop

content.question: What is the magnetic flux through the loop?

choices.label: <math alttext="7.9 times 10 to the negative 6 power tesla meter squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>7.9</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><msup><mtext>m</mtext><mtext>2</mtext></msup></mstyle></math>
